body_html: @akamaus - Could you please try commenting out lines 1093 through 1097 within this file. I think the main reason this code doesn't work on your CPU anymore is because it doesn't support SSE4. Thank you.
body_text: @akamaus - Could you please try commenting out lines 1093 through 1097 within this file. I think the main reason this code doesn't work on your CPU anymore is because it doesn't support SSE4. Thank you.
body: @akamaus - Could you please try commenting out lines 1093 through 1097 within [this file](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/94c513cc7f27d98ec6b5dead0af7fabcf5c5cd13/cmake/Dependencies.cmake#L1093). I think the main reason this code doesn't work on your CPU anymore is because it doesn't support [SSE4](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/SSE4). Thank you.
